(All I can say for RGDaN's post is...what the hell? That was risky on Liono 
behalf. Cyber Claw is right at the door, once he opened it she would of 
hauled tail or she would of torn him to shreds. She's on real high edge.)


Cyber Claw:




Cyber Claw growled at Striker's closeness. Her eyes were cold and watched 
him closely, watched ever movememnt he made. She hissed at him, with her 
body still pinned to the door. She wasn't moving until that door was opened.

"I won't join you even if you cared to spare my worthless life," she snarled 
at him. Her voice was rising to Dinobot's tone again, but this time is 
wasn't on purpose. "I've come here for only one thing. I want to know 
Megatron's whereabouts."


>From: Yanshosh@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Tue, 13 Jun 2000 17:05:22 EDT
>
>::Striker::
>
>Striker lets out a breath of relief as Dinobot takes several steps back. He
>puts away his guns and his shoulder blasters conceal themselves in his
>shoulders.
>
>Striker walks up to Cyber Claw.
>
>"Please transform and join us," he says in a soothing voice, "We will not
>harm you. Isn't that right, Dinobot?" He says the last sentence louder, so
>Dinobot would have no trouble hearing it.
>
>Striker then turns his head to Liono, looking at the stats on the
>holoprojector.
>
>"If their base is that well defended, we wouldn't have much of a chance
>defeating them, Liono," he says thoughtfully, looking at the info on the
>projector.
